document_data.mainbody: 'Fulta''' was a [[halfling]] criminal in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Fulta was a freelance criminal in Phlan with a group of her fellows acting as her guards.
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, Fulta and her guards were hired  by [[Soares]] to help silence an adventuring party hired to recover some stolen books but they were defeated and killed.{{Cite adventurers league/The Scroll Thief|13-14}}
